singlefamily22.description: DO NOT MISS THE GREAT MINI-MOVIE UNDER THE VIRTUAL TOUR.  IT'S MUST SEE T.V.!  Turnkey, mint condition.  Great jazz is floating through the air, someone's cranking up the cocktail shaker, and EVERYONE'S having a great time.  This is the little house that ROARED. EZ flow from Liv. Rm. to Din. Rm. to intimate den, all paved in beautiful, new hardwood floors.  Speaking of new:  Here's the list: Brand new magazine-worthy kitchen w/ all new appliances, brand new roof, new a/c, updated plumbing, high impact windows, new hot water heater, brand new paint inside and out, new, upgraded insulation, updated plumbing.  There's a genuine intimacy here that easily converts to ballgame parties, dinner parties, kids' birthday celebrations, or just dinner for two.  The large screened lanai enjoys views of the generous yard high-lighted by a big shady oak, planted the year the present owners first moved in. And, for extra storage and projects, the large (13 x 10) shed is wired with electricity. The half bath/utility room is not reflected in the county records, so add an extra 48 sq.ft.  A friendly, no-thru circle, this is one of the prettiest streets in Margaret Anne Subdivision.... with ez access to Westshore on one end and Manhattan on the other, close to  an electorama of activities:  Walk to Dairy Joy, the vegetable market, shabby chic shops, or hop the Gandy to the beaches.  Welcome Home!

One or more photo(s) has been virtually staged. FANTASTIC location in South Tampa! Great investment opportunity! On the corner of West Shore & Bay Vista, zoned for Commercial use. Building plans available. 3 bedrooms, 2 bath home with large, fenced lot. Home has been recently updated with new flooring and paint and appliances. Split floorplan is ideal for families or roommates. Enjoy the screened porch by relaxing or added entertaining space.   This is a prime location close to Bayshore, MacDill, Hyde Park Village, Raymond James, Westshore Marina District, Downtown and TPA!

This charming home in a quiet neighborhood offers two spacious living areas, new AC, hurricane impact windows throughout, brand new paint and carpet, granite counters, a large screened in porch overlooking the fenced in private backyard, a courtyard with pavers, a storage shed and a wide paved driveway to accommodate at least five vehicles. Centrally located close to schools, local shops, restaurants, Tampa International Airport, hospitals, and major highways.

Welcome home to your charming 2 bedroom/1 bath single family home with a large lot in the highly desirable South Tampa area. As you enter the home you immediately feel welcomed into this open floor plan with large living and dining room that open up to the updated kitchen.  LOTS of natural light give this home an airy bright feel.  This home features a Chef's kitchen with beautiful Granite Counters, newer Stainless Steel Appliances, commercial grade sink & newer light fixtures.  Connecting through to an adorable true mudroom that leads to your HUGE backyard.  Both Bedrooms have large closets and the bathroom has been updated complete with new vanity, bathtub, and marble shower.  Outback there is a large, screened patio to lounge plus a FULLY FENCED backyard with dog run, place for firepit, and detached shed equipped with electric for a workshop or storage. Also, at the front of the home there is an additional screened covered front porch - the current owner has enjoyed many days working from home outside in this space. NO HOA, NO DEED RESTRICTIONS, and NO CDD!! This home is in great condition with many recent upgrades in the past few years including kitchen, bathroom, paint, flooring, baseboards, water heater 2020, HVAC 2015, updated Electrical Box and 30 AMP hookup for RV, 10 Ft gate and fully fenced yard, and dog run! Amazing location in South Tampa to enjoy nearby trendy restaurants, coffee shops, walk along Tampa Bay on beautiful Bayshore, beautiful parks, museums, championship stadium/arena, and shopping centers.  Easy access to Tampa International Airport, and gorgeous award winning beaches.  This home is a must see!!

GREAT PRICE/ GREAT HOME AND GREAT LOCATION! THIS SOUTH TAMPA 3 bedroom, 2 bath block home is in PRISTINE CONDITION!  Upon entering this beautiful home you'll see the ORIGINAL WOOD FLOORS that have been refinished and lovingly maintained.  The kitchen has slate flooring, a stone backsplash, and all stainless appliances.  Then step down into the large 20X13 foot family room with wood-look plank tile.  The spacious 3rd. bedroom and inside laundry room with TONS OF NEW CABINETS are located off of the family room area, as well as the full 2nd bathroom.  The backyard is a great space to enjoy friends, family, and even fur babies! There is a lovely 15X15 screened lanai as well as a 10X15 shed in the back for you to store all your goodies AND an additional little storage room at the back of the house!  Plenty of parking spaces for vehicles, boats, or an RV.  PRIME LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION close to downtown Tampa, Bayshore, Westshore Marina District, Hyde Park Village Raymond James Stadium MacDill Airforce Base, Tampa International Airport, and all the great dining in the Bay Area!  NEWS FLASH...a state-of-the-art Manhattan Magnet School PK-8 with an estimated value of $45M is planned for the area.  Now is your opportunity to own in the area before prices rise!  THIS IS A GEM OF A HOME!

Live your best Florida Lifestyle in one of the most desirable areas of S. Tampa where the beaches are so close you can smell the ocean from your backyard. Quiet, respectful, family and pet friendly neighborhood, close to everything your heart desires: sunny beaches with the best margaritas, recreational parks, top restaurants, local Fresh Market, coffee shops…you name it, it’s all just minutes from your new home. This beautiful 4 bedroom/3 full bath home shows pride of ownership throughout. Second Master Bedroom & Bath added in 2010 maintained good flow in the floorplan while preserving plenty of backyard space for outdoor fun. Interior features a large Living Room with fireplace as well as a sizable Family Room providing 2 separate community areas, a bright Kitchen, an open Dining Room, an inside Laundry Room, a single car garage, and lovely original parquet wood floors. Exterior features include a double wide driveway for convenient parking, a very cozy side patio with pavers & a tin roof cover, a spacious backyard where you can easily add a pool and beautiful oak trees bordered by a drainage canal. Make this beautiful home yours today!
Entered for statistics only.

Cute home in great location, on corner lot. This home has a lot of potential and is in a great South Tampa location, close to major highways,  shopping, and restaurants. Roof and water heater are only 2 years old, and A/C is 7 years old. Check this home out before it is gone.

Stunning Modern New construction home set in South Tampa within minutes to Tampa Airport, Bayshore Boulevard, shopping, restaurants and all Tampa has to offer with 25 minutes to some of our beaches. This Gorgeous home features 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms with a downstairs den that can serve as a 5th bedroom with access to the 4th full bathroom downstairs.  Once through the front door the open floorplan sweeps you into the home with gray and white porcelain tile throughout the entire first floor.  The first floor is bright and open with a wall of sliders along the back of the home overlooking the newly completed sparking saltwater pool and screened in porch.  Your den and formal dining room a perfectly tucked away to the left side of the entry as you pass to the great room and the expansive gourmet kitchen. The kitchen is equipped with Samsung double ovens, pot filler, French door Samsung smart refrigerator, farmhouse style stainless sink, wine fridge, and an abundance of cabinets completed by the beautify quartz counter tops. Just off the kitchen area is a casual dining area with windows also overlooking the pool and full bathroom which also serves as the pool bath. As you proceed up the stairwell the intricate modern railing create very nice artistic detailing.  The second-floor features 4 bedrooms, 3 full bathroom, large laundry room, and bonus area opening to a covered porch. The second floor features high ceilings and engineered hardwood floors.  The master suite stretches across the back of the home and is a true oasis with a second covered porch open allowing those quiet moments with a pool view. The on suite master bathroom connects just past his and her walk-in closets. The spa-like master bathroom features a soaker tub, large rain shower with, dual vanities with quartz counter tops and lots if light streaming through. The 2nd bedroom features an on suite bathroom, and bedrooms 3 and 4 share a hall bathroom. The modern open feel is present throughout the entire home and is carried out to the new pool with sun shelf and water fall.  This home offers the complete packed with smart house wiring, foam insulation, 2 car garage, fully fenced in white vinyl, tons of storage and more.

If you are looking for a recently updated home that you can move into right away without needing any extra work done, here it is! This house is located in a quiet neighborhood close to Gandy and West Shore. 3 bedroom, 2 bath, beautifully renovated, fresh paint, brand new waterproof vinyl floors throughout, a new kitchen with quartz countertops, stainless steel LG appliances, and wood cabinets. New A/C, new plumbing, new bathroom featuring frameless glass doors. Spacious backyard featuring a pergola and a new paver patio space perfect for gatherings and entertaining. Live close to shopping, dining, and easy access to Selmon Express Way, minutes to International Airport,  Mac Dill Air-force Base Downtown, and Hyde Park SOHO area.

Under Construction. UNDER CONSTRUCTION. Photos are of a similar, completed "Palmeri" plan that may show options/upgrades no longer available.  Contact one of our friendly new home specialists to tour a nearby "Palmeri" for comparison purposes!    *Price includes structural and design upgrades already added such as a RARE 3-car garage AND covered Lanai*    The 2,857 square foot "Palmeri" plan is by far our most popular plan! Notable standard features include: downstairs bedroom and full bathroom, walk-in closets throughout, impressive master suite, and spacious loft area perfectly suited for a "media" room or play room!    Live just a short walk from the canals of Old Tampa Bay and within close proximity to plenty of South Tampa restaurants and shops! Easy access to the bridges to St. Petersburg and to Downtown Tampa.

First time buyer incentives & closing cost credits available! Hidden Gem Alert! Welcome home to this expansive 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home on an oversized corner lot! Large lot is shaded by a beautiful grand oak and this home offers a large 2 car garage. Lined with gorgeous hardwood floors in each bedroom, the primary bedroom has an en suite bathroom. Roof is 7 years old and AC is 3 years old. Large fenced in backyard is perfect for pets and the family. Located in the sought after Robinson School district and very centrally located to the Gandy bridge for those heading to St Pete & its Beaches.

Updated and move in ready concrete block home located in South Tampa's Guernsey Estate.  This home features a split floor plan, newer stainless steel appliances, A/C, and plumbing.  The galley style kitchen is bookended by a spacious laundry room and roomy dining area.  Ceiling to floor windows bathe the formal living room in lots of natural light.  Out back the large inviting backyard has ample patio space and a fire pit for relaxing private time or boisterous get togethers.

If you are looking for a move-in ready home, located on a large lot in South Tampa, this is it! Walk in the front door to find your open concept living and dining rooms, with wall-to-wall tile floors, great for entertaining or just relaxing with friends. The breakfast bar in the kitchen is the perfect spot for your morning coffee, or a terrific place to watch the chef at work! Initially a 2/1 impeccably renovated in 2013, a proper master suite was added in 2018 to create this beautifully finished 3/2. Walk down the hall to your spacious master bedroom. Boasting his/her closets with custom barn doors and high-end tile floors, this Master bedroom also has an on-suite bath, featuring a walk-in shower with dual shower heads and a double vanity. Step out back to find a large deck situated in your spacious, fully fenced back yard. Kick your feet up an enjoy a cool, fall evening in your backyard oasis. Conveniently located near some South Tampa staples, enjoy a short stroll to Westshore Pizza or Dairy Joy to complete the perfect day in your new home!

WATERFRONT SOUTH TAMPA TOWNHOME ON TAMPA BAY! Don't miss this rare opportunity to own a gorgeous home in a small gated enclave (8 units) directly on TAMPA BAY with a dock and boat slip.  Enjoy the WATER VIEWS and INCREDIBLE SUNSETS from your 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom townhome, with 2 large balconies and a patio. This townhome features an open and bright Living and Dining area with 2 sets of sliding glass doors that open to the balcony and a wood burning fireplace. The kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, including a Bosch dishwasher, upgraded cabinets, and a large amount of counter space. The Living and Dining area, the Kitchen and the Primary Suite all have Red Oak floors. The spacious Primary Suite features water views, sliding glass doors that open onto a large balcony that is perfect for your morning coffee and watching the dolphins and manatees swim by. All 3 bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms with granite or marble vanities. The pool is in the perfect location - just down the steps from your main living deck - just like having your own pool. Walk down to the fishing dock after grilling your dinner to watch the birds in flight. Launch your boat, kayak or jet ski from the dock and enjoy the best of Tampa Bay waterfront living. The two car garage provides storage space and includes the laundry room. There is also ample guest parking within the community. Located in South Tampa on Tampa Bay off of Westshore Blvd, this townhome is close to all major highways, Downtown, Tampa International Airport, fine dining, shopping, healthcare facilities, St. Pete and the Gulf Coast Beaches.

Welcome home to this charming single-story home located in one of South Tampa’s desirable neighborhoods! This 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom 1,369 sq ft modern-designed home is situated on an oversized, fully fenced corner lot, walking distance to some of South Tampa’s award-winning restaurants - Trattoria Pasquale, the Original Westshore Pizza, The Green Iguana and more! From the moment you pull up, you are welcomed by fresh landscaping and the ultimate modern curb appeal. Check out the photos to see the backyard potential! Choose from the ample parking available - under the carport, or along the extended driveaway - room for all your Florida toys! This residence features an inviting spacious floor plan equipped with water resistant laminate flooring. Your dream kitchen features all new appliances, custom-created range hood, deep drop-in sink, leathered granite countertops, recessed lighting, wood cabinets with plentiful storage, and designer tile backsplash. The primary suite features plenty of space for any size furniture you may have, complimented by a spacious walk-in closet, penny-tiled oversized walk-in shower with rainfall showerhead, gorgeous designer vanity with LED mirror, and sliding barn doors to top off the attention to detail. All secondary bedrooms are a great size, with excellent closet space and natural light. Enjoy your choice of two separate living spaces to use as you please – whether a playroom, home office, formal dining room, the options are endless. Off the flex space, you will find the indoor utility room with matching wood cabinetry and leathered granite countertop for any additional storage/folding, or even the perfect hidden wine bar! The back door with privacy shades allows easy access to the sizable covered back patio - ideal for dining al fresco or a calm place to sip your morning coffee, even during summer showers. The private fenced backyard allows plenty of room for a future pool, future addition/mother-in-law suite, and plenty of space for your fur-babies to run all day long! This home is perfectly located for those who value being within close proximity to downtown Tampa, Bayshore Blvd, Westshore Marina District, Hyde Park Village, MacDill Airforce Base, Raymond James Stadium, Tampa International Airport & the very best shopping, dining & schools offered in the bay area.

Don't miss this incredible opportunity to own a fully remodeled and tastefully designed home. This midcentury modern marvel has been designed with details to delight your senses. The stylish kitchen with quartz countertops, custom wood cabinets with soft-close drawers, and all new appliances is very welcoming. The dining room is perfect for all your dinner gatherings. Thhere is a second structure in the rear that offers over 300 SF of storage which can easily be converted into a studio/office.  The second and third bedrooms offer a functional space. Schedule a showing to see for yourself!

ADORABLE, UPDATED SOUTH TAMPA HOME!  This lovely 3 BR/2 BA ONE-STORY home w/FULLY-FENCED BACKYARD, large SCREENED/COVERED LANAI with pavers (an absolute MUST in FL!) and large elevated 12' x 24' shed that has been converted into an AIR-CONDITIONED HOME OFFICE. TERRIFIC LOCATION – mins. to Gandy Bridge (to St. Pete/southern beaches), Howard Franklin Bridge (to Clearwater/northern beaches), quaint Hyde Park Village restaurants and shoppes, 2 major malls/major retail - and booming downtown Tampa! ALMOST $40,000 IN UPGRADES TO THIS HOME (detailed Renov. List attached) incl.: NEWLY-REMODELED KITCHEN with STAINLESS STEEL appliances, 42” raised panel, soft-close cabinets, deep pot drawers, gorgeous GRANITE countertops & new NATURAL GAS line to range (2017-$13K); NEWLY-REMODELED MASTER BATH w/new shower tile, new plumb./lighting fixtures, new toilet/vanity/paint plus new luxury vinyl floor (2021-$6K); UPDATED HALL BATH w/new vanity top, fixtures, and plumbing; ALL NEW WINDOWS (2017-2020-$6K); NEW PVC PLUMBING DRAIN LINES (2021-$4K); Shed conversion into HOME OFFICE (2021-$3k), NEW recessed lighting-kitchen/NEW light fixture-dining room (2019-$1.2K), NEW HVAC duct work (2020-$1k) and more!  OPEN FLOOR PLAN with kitchen open to spacious family room and dining area with view of covered lanai which offers beautiful western sunset views in the evening. Bedrooms 2 & 3 also have beautiful oak wood flooring. ** Zoned to Robinson IB High School, too (International Baccalaureate program)! Homes in this area are going quickly due to downtown Tampa's growth the cultural and restaurant offerings in the area – plus water related activities (water taxies, boat rentals, multiple marinas/yacht clubs, etc.). Too much to list! South Tampa is growing quickly with many companies relocating here & recent opening of the NEW $153M MORSANI MEDICAL CENTER. Also close by: Westshore Mall/Int’l Mall/mega restaurants, Tampa Gen. Hospital, Amalie Arena (Go Lightning!), Channelside District, Tampa Riverwalk with its festivals & parks, county Courthouse, Performing Arts Center, museums, aquarium & more! Within mins of I-275, I-4, Crosstown Expwy. & Tampa Int’l Airport. This is a GREAT time to be in South Tampa!  All content incl. amounts/years completed is deemed reliable, but not guaranteed.

Blink and you will miss it!

Say hello to this hidden gem located in one of the best neighborhoods in South Tampa!  This 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home has been thoughtfully & beautifully transformed since the 2nd owners’ inception of the home. Your eyes will immediately gravitate towards the newer landscaping & freshly-painted designer hand-picked colors. Also, there are multiple spots to park your vehicles (or boat!) under the carport or on the extended driveway. Inside you’ll find an open layout with engineered hardwood flooring throughout, a custom kitchen with slow-close shaker cabinetry, marble countertops & backsplash to the ceiling, stainless steel appliances, farmhouse sink & more! Off the main living area you’ll find a bonus/flex space to utilize as you please. Each bedroom includes custom closets for maximum functionality & has plenty of natural light. When you step outside to your gated backyard, you’re sure to swoon over the oversized patio with plenty of outdoor space to enjoy with friends, family & fur babies alike. It’s even big enough to add a pool, addition or mother-in-law suite.  This home is perfectly located for those who value being within a close proximity to downtown Tampa, MacDill Airforce Base, Raymond James Stadium, TIA & some of the very best shopping, dining & schools offered in the bay area.

Seller giving a $10,000 seller credit towards buyer's closing costs. ***Multiple offers received****Highest and best 4/21/2022 by 5pm. SOUTH TAMPA townhome with NO HOA. Beautiful Townhome on a wide canal with direct access to Tampa Bay.  Home features a 24kGenerator plus two propane tanks holding 80gallons each, Nest door and doorbell technology, new pavers allowing for more parking space, new washer and dryer with humidifier attachment. This home has it all. Approximately 2,500 SF with 3 bedrooms, plus an office, loft space and flex space! Open concept on the ground floor with lots of natural lighting. The entry features a light and bright flex space that could be used as a formal dining room. Off the main living room, you will find a screened patio perfect for enjoying your morning coffee. From the deck that extends over the water, you can unwind from the day with a beverage while watching sunsets and the occasional manatee that swims by.  The chef’s kitchen features classic dark wood 42” cabinets, granite countertops, breakfast bar, stainless appliances and pantry.  The top of the stairs features a large loft area perfect for a home office or lounge area. The master's suite features water views, ample space for a full king set and seating, and an oversized walk in closet. The en-suite bathroom includes 2 sink vanities, make-up vanity, garden tub, linen closet, glass shower enclosure and a separate toilet room. The upstairs laundry room includes washer and dryer, utility sink and a folding table. The air handler room houses the dual AC units and doubles as extra storage. The 2 car garage can accommodate 2 average sized SUV's. The high ceilings in the garage leave plenty of room for the addition of overhead storage racks if desired. The home is elevated above the base flood plain resulting in lower flood insurance. Current owner pays $700/year for flood. No HOA means no pet or leasing restrictions and you own the land.  Located off Westshore Blvd near dining and entertainment with TIA, MacDill AFB, Hyde Park,Tampa General,Downtown Tampa & St. Pete all under 15 minutes.

Pre-Construction. To be built. Pre-Construction. To be Built.  Builder is listing this property for the seller with a new construction home to be built.  This is listing is for the Palmeri floor plan but because it is pre-construction you can select your floor plan from Domain Homes and make all of your interior selections in their design studio.  You'll be surprised to find just how spacious this light & bright home is w/ lots of natural sunlight! Large, open eat-in kitchen features exquisite granite countertops w/ breakfast bar, nook for breakfast table.  Kitchen opens up to Family Room w/ plenty of room for large furniture. Dining Room is so spacious that you could split the room into a living & dining room. 1st floor bedroom offers a walk-in closet & storage underneath stairs & full guest bath w/ shower. Upstairs, you'll find an OVERSIZED BONUS ROOM that could be used for additional living space, game room, play room, movie room, office or homework room! The possibilities are endless! Split-plan upstairs includes Master Suite on one side featuring a double-door entry & luxurious en suite bathroom w/ granite countertops, dual sinks & mirrors, extra-large step-in glass shower, private water closet, linen storage & HUGE WALK-IN CLOSET w/ plenty of room for your clothes AND shoes! Two additional bedrooms can be found on opposite side & share a full bathroom w/ dual sinks & granite countertops  & separate water closet w/ tub/shower combo. Backyard is a great space for future pool build and to have a barbecue & entertain friends! Sliding doors open out to the oversized, covered lanai. Home also includes DOUBLE PANE LOW E WINDOWS, HURRICANE SHUTTERS & HIGH-END MOEN BRAND FAUCETS.  Home will be built 1ft above the base flood elevation. This transaction will need to be with a construction loan.  Contract for property with seller and contract with Builder with selected floor plan.  Domain Homes offers 3 lenders who can provide a construction loan.  Photos and virtual tour are of a previously built floor plan shown with options and upgrades.  If you drive by the house on property will be demo'd by seller.

Sensational South Tampa is where you'll find this home on a large fenced corner lot. Enter the light and bright living area with luxury tile flooring that flows throughout the entire main floor. If you have an RV or boat, you’ll love the huge driveway with plenty of room on either side of your fence for parking all your toys. With quick access to the Gandy and cross town and a short trip up Manhattan to 275 you’ve got great access to all of Tampa Bay. Don’t miss this one and come see it today!

South Tampa is the place to be! This home has it all! Walk into an open plan that's light, bright, and flows nicely. Kitchen and dining are open to the living spaces for easy entertaining. Nicely updated with modern fixtures and details throughout. Spacious bedrooms and one could be a potential office/workout space. Easily access the screened pool and backyard area for relaxing in your spare time. Location is key, and this home is minutes to all that South Tampa has to offer with quick access to all major roadways and close to all your favorite shops and restaurants. See it today!

Charming South Tampa Bungalow! The house has 3 bedrooms and 2 baths, with a split floor plan and a den. You enter into a large foyer that takes you into the living area. To the right is the living room that has a wood-burning fireplace and to the left are the 2 smaller bedrooms and a full bath. The dining room which borders the living room can fit a large table. The main suite with its en suite bath is tucked away at the back of the house. The house has a large kitchen with enough room to fit a small table and chairs. The den/office is situated at the back of the house. There is a lovely screened-in porch that looks out to a serene zen-like backyard. The oversized garage has great potential to become a separate apartment or a mother-in-law suite. The washer and dryer and a second full-sized refrigerator are located in the garage. The storage capabilities are endless. This property is located near everything that South Tampa has to offer. 10 minutes to downtown. Great shopping and restaurants are 5 minutes away. Come and see it today!

BACK ON THE MARKET! Tucked away on a private road on Kauai's south side is a hidden gem of a home on 2.6 acres of land. Designed by noted Big Island architect, the late Boone Morrison, and constructed by Kauai-builder Bob Mikkelsen, the home combines an overall feeling of Hawaiiana with the clean lines of mid-century modern design—truly a one-of-a-kind. Boone employed a practice of designing large, usable rooms, lighted by massive windows on several sides, with soaring ceilings and gleaming hardwood floors. This over 3,000 sf home is a wonderful example of his work.   Slate floors greet you at the entrance of the home and into the kitchen and baths. Custom woodwork, including the remaining flooring, lanai, custom trim work and beams, is featured throughout the home, all from locally-sourced hardwoods. The home was constructed in two phases, with the entry, kitchen, large dining room, primary suite and additional bath on one side, and the grand living room and loft/office on the other. The two structures are connected via a 1000 sf covered lanai, adding an abundance of usable outdoor living space to the overall footprint of the home. The total combined square footage under roof is 4355. Guest house rights are included with the property.  The current owners have transformed the land into a botanical garden with one of the most extensive collections of rare palms and cycads in the Hawaiian Islands. The property features an extensive network of paved pathways interconnected with trails which lead to a stream and waterfall below the property, and panoramic views of the surrounding areas from the ridge line above the home. * The adjacent 1.68 acre parcel with two-car garage, workshop and house rights can also be purchased with this property. (TMK: 4-2-5-2-15-4). >Property Video can be viewed here: https://player.vimeo.com/video/724252961 >Virtual Walk through can be viewed here: https://www.asteroom.com/pviewer?hideleadgen=1&token=T07aCGyzUU_BTYcVuAK

"The Telephone Building" is an historic building in downtown Newport constructed in the late 19th century in Beaux-Arts style. This iconic, one-of-a-kind property was designed by Boston architects Perkins & Betton, the team behind the famed King Block on Newport's storied Bellevue Avenue. The building's brick and limestone façade features dentil molding and a grand Palladian window. The property was sensitively restored and converted into a residential building consisting of a spectacular loft-style owner's unit and various income opportunities, thanks to its location in the General Business zone. The owner's unit is contemporary in feel, yet retains historic elements, abounding in repurposed materials, exposed brick, oversized windows, and artisanal encaustic cement tile inserts. A floating staircase leads from the loft to an intimate rooftop salon that opens to a dramatic deck and green-roof garden overlooking Trinity Church, downtown Newport, and the Newport Bridge and Harbor. This unit lends itself to a live/work lifestyle with a first floor space that is ideal for an at-home office or gym. Just above the three-bedroom, 2.5 bathroom owner's space is a separate and stylish one-bedroom space with roof deck access--perfect for extended family or Airbnb income. Finally, there is a two-bedroom first floor apartment with a cool mix of hardwood and polished concrete floors and its own Zen garden nestled in the back of the property, creating an urban oasis.

The meeting/community room (loc in Blding 30) has a bar area & fireplace, you can settle on the comfy couches & watch TV, play the baby grand piano or entertain guests. Play cards or pool in the Billiards Room & for outdoor fun, enjoy the beautiful inground pool, make dinner & dine in the grill area or hang out & read in the gazebo. There is even a fun playground & shallow pool for the tots! The conveniently located unit is filled w/natural light & has a great open floor plan. The Kit boasts granite counters, Stainless Steel Appliances only 8 yrs old, breakfast bar & an extra space that could be a dining area or Study/Office space! The large master Bedroom has a walk-in closest & it's own bathroom, the 2nd Bdrm is spacious & the 2nd bath has just been updated & features a new large, tiled, glass enclosed shower. Carpets have been just cleaned & the paint freshened. The stackable laundry is in the unit, natural gas heat, Central AC & even has a 2 Car, tandem garage in the building!! Enjoy everything West Hartford living offers from your own special & relaxing home!

Back On Market!!! Welcome to your newly renovated townhome in Tumblebrook Estates in West Hartford! Tumblebrook  is a quiet, small community with a neighborhood setting close to many amenities. This spacious 3 bed / 2.5 bath home offers a grand entryway that leads to a massive entertaining parlor with formal dining and living area. Beautiful hardwood floors throughout most of the home.  Crown molding throughout home and beautiful fireplace adds gorgeous focal point. French patio doors open to private deck for grilling or evening drinks under the stars. The first floor half bath and large coat closet is easy access for guests. Fully remodeled kitchen with new stainless-steel appliances, granite & sleek backsplash makes for perfect dinner entertaining. Plenty of cabinets and closets throughout the home. Custom wooden window shutters throughout house allows for tailored amount of sunlight as you wish. Master suite invites you with cozy fireplace brand new carpet, newly renovated bath with jetted tub and dbl vanity. Walk in closet has built in shelving and safety boxes for your valuables. 2nd floor has full bath with quartz dbl vanity, 2 great size bedrooms and laundry area & a sitting window seat. Basement is also finished with plenty of closet space and new carpet, adding approximately 900 sqft for extra living space, bedroom or office.  All mechanics are less than 2yr old and all in great shape. This home is perfect for you to come in and unpack just in time for the holidays!! Back on market due to buyer not ok with rental terms of HOA

singlefamily22.description: You will fall in love with this elegant, inviting & meticulously maintained 1 bedroom condo with spectacular natural views!! The updated eat-in kitchen welcomes you with warm toned countertops, cabinets & subway tile backsplash, along with wood flooring. All stainless steel appliances including a double sink, a GAS cooktop & built-in microwave. Cozy kitchen eating area overlooks the dining & living rooms with views out the French doors to the patio & natural surroundings. The formal dining & living rooms are open concept with wood flooring, recessed lighting & a gas log fireplace with marble surround & a mantle. A wall of French doors in the living room leads to the private, oversized patio with the most beautiful natural views of the preserved landscape. The super spacious primary bedroom has wood floors, a bay window...the perfect spot for a desk or sitting area, walk-in closet plus a double door closet & full bath. The full primary bath has tile flooring, separate soaking tub & shower stall, double sink vanity & a linen closet as well as private toilet nook. The cozy den has a a ceiling fan, carpeting & built-ins. This is the perfect spot for a cup of tea, a daybed & some TV viewing or an overnight guest to sleep. A half bathroom with tile flooring is attached to the den. A well appointed laundry room/pantry is off of the half bath with ample storage & a washer & dryer.  The unit has secured individual storage in the garage w/elevator access plus one assigned parking spot. The secured building has a main lobby intercom system for visitors, a common mail area & sitting area. The building has a fully equipped exercise room, a meeting room & a game room/library for use. There is visitor parking directly in front of the building as well as in the garage.

singlefamily22.description: Sophisticated elegance in the heart of Blue Back Square!  Incredible 2 bedroom end unit plus a den/office w/window.  You will fall in love from the moment you enter this lovely unit.  Incredible open layout - kitchen w/high end appliances open to a large living room/dining room w/fireplace, lots of oversized windows for wonderful light and a French door open to a balcony.  There is a master bedroom suite w/a full bathroom that boasts double sinks, a separate tub and shower and a large walk-in closet. There is a charming guest bedroom w/a walk in closet and access to a full bath w/shower.  There is the added bonus of a perfect den/office w/a large window and built-ins for the ease of working from home.  There are 2 parking spaces (66 & 67) and a storage unit (72-B).  Enjoy all that Blue Back Square has to offer - shopping, restaurants, library, Whole Foods market and a movie theater just outside your door.  Beautiful lighting, Brazilian cherry floors throughout, custom built-ins, open layout and lots of natural light add to the perfection of this unit!  Truly a wonderful place to call home! Incredible high end furnishings can be sold separate from the sale of the unit.

Built in 2019 * Two bedroom (plus+) Townhouse condominium in West Hartford.  **TENANT IN PLACE - SIX MONTH LEASE SIGNED FROM JAN 1 - JUNE 30***. Two full bath - gorgeous END UNIT; just moments away from the action that West Hartford offers!  Freshly painted with new high-end light fixtures. High efficiency heating and cooling. Conveniently located near I84 and short distance from Blue Back Square, UCONN medical and downtown.  This modern and tastefully decorated condo boasts 9’ ceilings throughout with hardwood flooring and custom blinds.   Granite counters in the kitchen (new tiled backsplash) and pristine bathrooms. The bedrooms are generously sized with walk-in closets in each and double sinks on the second floor bathroom.  You're going to love having laundry on the second floor. Make sure to check out the garage with its separate flex space for a home office or gym. Schedule your private showing today! Please use GHAR contract - please leave lights as you have found them.  Town shows SF as 1150 - Condo was built in 2019, per builder who also indicated SF is 1164    TENANT HAS A FIRST RIGHT OF REFUSAL ON ANY OFFERS PRESENTED

Beautiful unit at Stonebridge Estates. Kit w/granite & SS appliances. Living room w/see through FP to DR. Open floor plan. Master bedroom w/full bath and walk-in closet. Upgraded moldings, recessed lighting and more! Roof top terrace.

Perfectly styled and visually stunning ranch-style condo in a residential area near the bustling West Hartford Center and just a short walk from historic Elizabeth Park. Beautiful details throughout - reclaimed woods, gorgeous marbles and tiles, and a wonderful open floorplan with lots of space. Artfully designed Tudor style building with quality craftmanship and details. Big, bright windows illuminate the open floor plan with 9' ceilings, hardwood floors, two bedrooms PLUS an office/guest room, and luxurious updates throughout.  The living room with tall windows, French door to a balcony, and coffered ceiling features a beautiful fireplace with antique barnwood mantle, bluestone hearth and custom shiplap details.  This is open to the spacious dining area and the remodeled kitchen with an amazing 8' white marble island, Mediterranean inspired tile backsplash, stainless steel appliances, deep farmers sink, and walk-in pantry.  French doors open to the master bedroom suite with custom California Closet and a spacious bath with walk-in marble shower.  In addition to another bedroom and full bath, there is another room perfect for an office or guest room! Other features include a remodeled laundry room, Gas heat, central a/c, and a tandem two-car garage space.  Privately located on the third floor of this well-maintained small complex building of only 16 units with elevator service and a rooftop patio.  Welcome Home!

WOW PRICE for Parsons Farm town house with GARAGE! This charming 2 bedroom 1.5 bath home, on the quiet side of the complex, has an open living room/dining area with laminate flooring. The living room has a fireplace and sliders to a brick patio; the dining area has a pass-through to the kitchen. The first floor half bath and upstairs full bath have been nicely updated. The lower level is finished with a laundry area. The convenient parking is a garage and 1 open space. It's a short walk to Elmwood Center's dining, stores, restaurants, Wolcott and Beachland Parks, and the CTFastrack station.

Built in 2007, this very special 2 bedroom 2 bathroom second floor unit is close to everything! Located just south of Bishops Corner and a 5 minute drive to West Hartford Center, this open floor plan, ranch style condo has nine foot ceilings and hardwood floors. The kitchen has granite counters, a breakfast bar and lots of storage! The master bedroom has its own private bathroom with double sinks and two closets, and on the other side of this unit is the second bedroom, which has wall to wall carpet and a generous sized closet. Around the corner is the full size washer and dryer, followed by the huge second full bathroom with a stall shower. This unit also comes with one covered parking space, which is only steps away from the locked and secured back door to the complex. In need of more storage? There is a dedicated and locked storage area in the shared basement. Somerset has a community room that can be rented out for private parties and this room has a full kitchen, which is highlighted in the photos. There is also a library and a wonderful gym that can be accessed by using the key fob at anytime, day or night. Move right into this setting and enjoy all that West Hartford and Somerset have to offer!

Welcome to Somerset - built in 2007, it is one of only a few newer condo complexes in West Hartford.  The location is ideal -  it's a short stroll along sidewalks to shops/restaurants/services at Bishop's Corner; commuting connections are a snap via car or public transportation; and being a resident of award-winning West Hartford means you'll have access to top notch schools, public services and parks/recreation. This south facing unit is flooded with sunlight making it cheery and bright.  The high ceilings and open floor plan create a sense of spaciousness not felt in condos of similar square footage.  The bedrooms are ideally located on either side of the main living areas, and the kitchen lives large with lots of cabinets and a breakfast bar.  Recent upgrades include: fresh paint throughout, new washer/dryer in unit, new refrigerator in 2020, bathroom upgrades, hardwood flooring and HVAC servicing. What makes this unit stand out is the attached carport offering direct access to the building. Community amenities include: exercise room, party room w/ kitchen, library, outdoor patios and grilling area.  This unit also conveys with a spacious storage room located in lower level.

singlefamily22.description: Great Price for this spacious 1-bedroom unit. The open-plan living room/dining/kitchen is great for entertaining, with enough space for traditional dining furniture. The full-sized kitchen has a breakfast area, stainless appliances, and plenty of cabinet and counter space. The study can also work as space for occasional guests. The building offers an exercise room and community room, in a lovely country setting near the reservoir. OFFER SUBJECT TO PROBATE APPROVAL.

WELCOME HOME TO 26 SCHOOLHOUSE DRIVE, #210...THE BEST OF THE BEST! This gorgeous, 2 BR, 2 BA, END UNIT Ranch-style condo in the Quaker Green Complex is truly luxurious, one floor living at its BEST!  At 1,099 sq. feet, this is THAT spacious, corner end unit that rarely becomes available! With all the extra windows and radiant light shining in, plus the fabulous location, the private balcony off of the living room, and stunning views of the pool..HURRY because this special condo will not last long!  Imagine yourself cooking for friends in the sophisticated, modern kitchen with rich cabinets, granite counters and SS appliances.   Numerous upgrades have been added to this unit! You will enjoy the convenience of the stackable washer and dryer in unit, gleaming hardwood floors, central air, the tandem 2 car garage conveniently located directly under the condo and.. so much more. The Primary Suite boasts an amazing walk -in closet and luxurious en suite private bath! It includes a charming, built in window seat overlooking the gorgeous pool and lush grounds.    Lots of space and possibilities exist for you to make it your own. Perhaps you will convert the cute "nook" space off of  the kitchen into your home office? Or, the 2nd bedroom could  function as your den, nursery, guest room, office, or more?   Convenience, luxury, low maintenance, affordability, amazing amenities and one floor living at IT'S BEST, Unit #206 is definitely the condo of your dreams! Don't miss the  fun, social Clubhouse for all ages to enjoy! Rent it out for private parties,watch a football game with a group of friends, play billiards, or sit by the roaring fire and visit with friends. Patio seatig is available throughout the grounds so you can dine "al fresco"one evening or, take your laptop and work ourdoors.  You can't forget that one of the greatest attractions for living in Quaker Green is "THE CONVENIENT LOCATION!"  Just around the corner ,are some terrific local restaurants like the famous Pepe's Pizza, Zaytoons and popular Beachland Tavern. Of course, West Hartford Center, Blueback Square and Westfarms Mall are just minutes away to spend the day shopping and dining. You are centrally located to go  anywhere and enjoy all that West Hartford, and the surrounding areas have to offer! Quaker Green offers you the beautiful, updated,luxury condo homes at affordable prices.   Coming "HOME" everyday to your beautiful home at 26 Schoolhouse Drive, Unit #210 is sure to be the " Icing On The Cake!!"

PLEASE NOTE BEST AND FINAL OFFERS ARE DUE BY SATURDAY, DECEMBER 11, 2021 AT 7:00 PM.  HOME FOR THE HOLIDAYS!! Treat yourself to the ultimate gift this year... A NEW HOME! Come tour 5 Davenport Road, West Hartford and see all it can offer you. This rarely available, spacious,3 Bedroom, 2 1/2 Bath Townhome is move-in ready so start packing your bags.This is the gift that will keep on giving for years to come! Not to mention ALL the incredible features that are sure to check all the boxes on your list. Central Air? Check! Attached 1 car garage? Check! You won't find a special unit like this one on the market very often, with all these upgrades and priced to sell. It will not last long so dont miss out!   On the main floor are beautiful hardwood floors throughout, fresh interior paint and a crisp white kitchen with a charming breakfast nook.The spacious LR/DR combination, w/ the open floor plan includes a cozy wood fireplace and is perfect for entertaining. Sliders lead out to your own private deck. Upstairs, 3 spacious bedrooms including the beautiful Primary Suite, complete with built-in closets and its' own private bath. The basement provides an    additonal 696 sq ft ideal for storage & laundry. If you are seeking the ease of a maintenance free lifestyle, this is the home for you. No more mowing or shoveling! Conveniently located near Westfarms Mall, West Hartford Center, Wolcott Park and major highways.. you're just minutes from everything! Make your list and check it twice!

NEW TO THE MARKET! OVER 55 COMMUNITY IN A GORGEOUS SETTING WITH NUMEROUS WALKWAYS TO EXPLORE ON THE GROUNDS. THIS UNIT IS LOCATED ON THE THIRD FLOOR OF THE BUILDING HIGHER UP ON THE HILL GIVING IT A FABULOUS VIEW FROM ITS BALCONY OVERLOOKING THE HILLS OF THE RESERVOIR . THE UNIT IS JUST THE RIGHT SIZE WITH A GENEROUS SIZE LIVING ROOM WITH A GAS FIREPLACE. THE LARGE EATIN KITCHEN HOLDS A NICE SIZE TABLE. THE MASTER BEDROOM IS A GOOD SIZE, HAS 2 CLOSETS AND A MASTER BATH WITH 2 SINKS, A TUB AND A SEPARATE SHOWER.  THE OTHER BEDROOM CAN DO DOUBLE DUTY AS A DEN OR AN EXTRA BEDROOM WHEN NEEDED. NEXT TO It IS THE OTHER FULL BATH. THIS UNIT HAS A LAUNDRY/ STORAGE ROOM AS WELL. THERE IS ADDITIONAL STORAGE IN THE BASEMENT WHERE THIS UNIT HAS 1 ASSIGNED PARKING SPACE.  THIS IS A GREAT NEXT HOME FOR SOMEONE..HURRY OVER!

Wow! Don't miss this turn-key 2 bedroom, 2 bath unit in West Hartford's sought after Somerset complex. This newer unit features an open floor plan, high ceilings, crown molding, hardwood flooring, central air, laundry in the unit (washer and dryer included), and an amazing complex location overlooking the courtyard and offering a side entrance for quick and easy unit access. Somerset has a community room for gatherings/get-togethers, a library, a fitness center/gym, a secure storage area, double elevators, and much more! A short walk to Bishops Corner shopping, library, & restaurants and just minutes from Blue Back Square.

"Welcome home to your RARE newly constructed townhome in West Hartford. Conveniently located near UConn medical, restaurants, shopping, Blue Back Square and I-84. This 2020 townhome offers 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1-car garage and a FINISHED BONUS ROOM on the lower level that is perfect for your home office or overnight guests. The main level open floor plan includes features such as 9’ ceilings, hardwood floors, high efficient stainless steel kitchen appliances and granite countertops. Plenty of natural light beams through and the open-concept is perfect for entertaining. As you make your way upstairs, you will find two bedrooms with hardwood floors, each with its own walk-in closet.  You will also find a gorgeous bathroom with double sinks, generous sized linen closet and tiled walk-in shower with glass door. Laundry area is conveniently located on the upper level. Additional upgrades include recessed lighting, backsplash, blinds, ceiling fans, bathroom fixtures and painted garage just to name a few. You don’t want to miss this one. Schedule your viewing today!"

Absolutely stunning freestanding ranch unit in the highly desirable Reservoir community, directly across the road from the West Hartford reservoir and less than a 5 minute drive to The Center brimming with shops and restaurants! Fantastic location in the complex at the end of a small cul-de-sac backing to one of the wooded trails. Step inside and be greeted by soaring ceilings, large windows and gleaming hardwood floors. The floor plan is open and flowing - perfect for entertaining, yet also has cozy areas for quiet relaxation. The living room features a marble gas fireplace and is open to the spacious eat-in kitchen with Corian counters, gas range, double oven, pantry and plenty of cabinets.  The bright formal dining room features a cathedral ceiling and plenty of room to accommodate large gatherings.  Across the foyer is the cozy study with walk-in closet.  Two ensuite bedrooms both offer walk-in closets and full baths, and the primary bath has a walk-in shower with seat.  Other features include a laundry room, private deck, an expansive unfinished basement with a NEW Lennox natural gas furnace/central a/c with transferrable warranty, security system and two car garage.  Beautifully maintained and well-planned grounds with meandering paths and trails.  Welcome Home!

Everything you want with-in walking distance to Blue Back Square and West Hartford Center! Come and see this spacious 2 bedroom condo on the second floor in an historic WH 6-plex. Gleaming hardwood floors throughout, high ceilings, moldings and trim.......all the charm of 1924.  The rooms are generously sized with lots of storage. The updated stainless steel kitchen has butcher block counters and beautifully lit glass front cabinets for a french country feel. Enjoy your morning coffee sitting outside on your front covered balcony.  There is a common laundry room in the basement along with private storage. A one car garage, #4, comes with this unit. This building offers a common outdoor gathering area for entertaining and grilling.  Walk to all West Hartford Center has to offer.... the restaurants, shops, Whole Foods, town services and Library.  Just a quick step to bus service to downtown Hartford! This Condo checks off all the boxes.

A Special rare opportunity to own this stunning, seldom available private end unit, Litchfield condo w/1st floor master suite. The entire condo has been repainted, top to bottom in todays sought after neutral palate. New gray carpet & beige carpeting on the upper level complement the interior. Many sliders throughout, bring sunshine in. You must see this superb, unparalleled location. Your Cathedral ceiling, spacious, Fireplaced living room opens to a large dining room plus a 3 seasons sun room providing additional square footage while overlooking a most private location of one of the pools, tennis court & garden, further enhanced by an outdoor patio & stone wall to a vast vista of lush landscaping & golf course. Amazing views!!A lovely kitchen has all new  stainless appliances and a nice window area eating area. The first floor boasts your 1st floor master bedroom w/an updated double MSTRBTH & double vanity. The other first floor bedroom can double as a den w/ access to a third sink, adjoining the bathroom. The upper level enjoys a large loft/office area + another graciously sized  possible Masterbdm w/ full bath.The garage has closed storage space. Rear of the condo has extra parking space. Experience all the amenities the " Woods" has to offer: a club house and restaurant, 4 pools, 7 tennis courts, paddle courts, a gardening area and available membership to the Golf Club. Monthly fee plus $35 month for restaurant, $446.75 per month for Cable,. Quarterly i taxes= $549.

5 Bishop Rd #307, West Hartford, CT 06119 is a condo home that contains 1,533 sq ft and was built in 1963. It contains 2 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms. This home last sold for $375,000 in April 2022. 
 
The Zestimate for this house is $434,900. The Rent Zestimate for this home is $2,600/mo.

A complete remodel was taken down to the studs in 2016. Now has approved Plans to add an additional 1198 sqft to this Private Estate making the main house 3500 plus a casita of 450 sqft (5 bed 7 bath), with whitewater, Catalina, and city light views. Currently, a 4 bedroom 4 1/2 bath Laguna Beach home has views and privacy with walkability to the village. Carefully designed Transitional Beach Craftsman home with 500 square foot legal casita across the courtyard with full kitchen, washer, and dryer.  Smooth stucco white finish, Italian Tile, Epi Decking, outdoor hot and cold shower, our door fire pit and barbecue,  beamed and boxed ceilings, copper trim gutters, and caps, impressive attention to detail. Open concept main level includes 180-degree views, gourmet kitchen with Viking and SubZero appliances, walk in pantry, Carrera and Bardiglio marble counters, custom cabinets, all wood clad pass-through windows & bi-fold doors open to ocean view terraces, 3 washer and dryer stations.  All 4 bedrooms have private baths. Master bedroom has stunning views 180-degree views, fireplace, walk-in closet, rain shower & washer and dryer.  Walk to The Village, fine dining, galleries, shopping, festivals & world-class beaches. Truly one of the finest homes on the market.  Purchase before construction starts or buy after construction is completed at a much higher price. (Make sure to view the 3-d Tour) .

Live Auction! Bidding to start from $800,000! 1595 Arroyo Drive is a charming bungalow-style cottage located in the desirable canyon area of Laguna Beach. Boasting a 7,500 sqft lot, this is the best-priced single-family home in Laguna Beach. The property backs up to a nature reserve providing a peaceful and serene setting for nature lovers. The street is a quiet cul-de-sac with lots of potential for expansion or an accessory dwelling unit. The home has a large one-car garage and an additional three parking spaces, as well as plenty of visitor parking on the street. The home's 800 sqft floor plan includes 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom. The property also features a private backyard, perfect for an artist's retreat or an escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. This cozy home offers the perfect blend of location, style and potential. The property boasts an excellent location, just a short walk from the town's restaurants, Main beach, and a huge nature reserve with trails. The property is also close to world-renowned art festivals and galleries, such as the Sawdust Art Festival and the Pageant of The Masters. This is a rare opportunity to own a piece of Laguna Beach, a world-class destination. Don't miss out on the chance to make this charming cottage your own.

Experience warmth, nature and tranquility. Situated on a quiet cul-de-sac in a serene setting, this single-story cedar home with ocean views on an oversize lot has 3 bedrooms and 2 baths. The property features aesthetic architecture with high vaulted ceilings, ceiling to floor windows with sunlight streaming in and stunning views of sunrises and sunsets. The chef in you will delight in the updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops and designer cabinetry. The primary suite opens to a private deck overlooking the picturesque hillsides, and two secondary bedrooms offer room for family and guests. Beautifully landscaped front and back yards are wonderful for outdoor entertaining, creative gardening or just enjoying some peaceful relaxation. Direct access to the house is convenient from an oversized two car garage that is well suited for storage and work areas. Two additional spaces in the driveway provide plenty of parking. Just moments away are Laguna’s renowned beaches, shopping, restaurants, hiking trails, mountain biking and award-winning schools.

Commanding a coveted front row position at the world-famous Montage Laguna Beach Resort with incredible ocean views, this undeniably impressive contemporary estate defines luxury living. Remodeled in 2022, this world-class custom home is a masterpiece of craftsmanship featuring only the finest materials throughout. Its dramatic yet inviting decor delivers both serene comfort and opulent style, with countless spaces designed for indoor-outdoor living. The home boasts huge walls of glass that open the residence to lush landscaping and private outdoor spaces, while an expansive central skylight floods both levels with natural light. The home’s generously proportioned spaces include 5 bedrooms, all ensuite, and 6 spa-like bathrooms over two levels that are richly detailed with Calacatta marble, Albertini Italian doors, zebra wood, and other ultra high-end materials. The upper level features a spacious living area with a modern glass fireplace, vaulted ceilings, temperature-controlled wine wall, and a chef’s dream Bulthaup kitchen with stainless steel Miele appliances, Wolf range and a stainless steel pantry with a Dacor wine station. The kitchen flows seamlessly to the home’s outdoor oceanside oasis, complete with a brand new glass fire pit, outdoor shower, outdoor kitchen with built-in Viking grill, ice maker, refrigerator, Kalamazoo pizza oven, and sparkling pool and spa accessible directly from the master suite. The extravagant lower level is accessed via a dramatic floating staircase and leads to a full bar, home theater, gaming space, incredibly spacious and luxurious home office center complete with a full bath, glass-encased commercial wine cellar and an outdoor courtyard with a one-story waterfall. The home also offers tons of storage space throughout, a 3-car garage with epoxy flooring, effortless home security, and state-of-the-art Crestron technology to ease and automate practically every amenity and process imaginable. Located on a third of an acre, this spectacular residence is one of just 13 private homes at the resort with ownership privileges that include access to the Montage concierge, housekeeping, and room service, delivering a true resort-like living experience. Encompassing all of this, while just a few steps away from crystal clear Pacific Ocean waters, there is truly no better location in Orange County. Rarely do location, design, and such endless amenities align so comprehensively.

This is the home one dreams of but never expects to find in the real world. This perfect oceanfront setting is complemented by a residence of exquisite style. Never to be replicated under current building restrictions, the villa is carefully positioned into the site just above the water’s edge. It takes advantage of the grandfathered position of its predecessor and as such, rests comfortably on the site as if it was always meant to be. The result is a unique relationship between the interiors and the vistas of the rugged coastline, azure waters, and sunsets that is simply unequalled on this coast. Nearly 7,000 square feet of living area was painstakingly designed by the esteemed firm of Tichenor & Thorp in a coastal Italian style. It takes full advantage of the scintillating and experiential sensory opportunities of the setting including the ocean breezes, sounds of the crashing waves, and the golden light that bathes the house throughout the day. The interiors are refined and comfortable, with each room carefully layered by a studied eye with antique materials and exceptional craftsmanship. The result is both harmonious and elegant. The house features a flowing, open, and eminently livable floor plan where one gracious room leads, uninterrupted, to the next. French doors open from every major room to seaside terraces and mature European gardens all cascading toward the shore. Antique inlaid garden walls dating back over 100 years create outdoor rooms, overlooks, and guide a private path to the sand below. The primary suite is situated on the top floor and enjoys a majestic positioning. It includes a private view terrace, a Moroccan themed bath, and ample closet + dressing area. Another ocean view suite shares this floor. The main level includes the living room, which adjoins the paneled family room. The family room leads in one direction to the bar, guest bath, and main guest suite. In the other direction, it leads to the formal dining room, immense kitchen, and a sea view morning room. A large view terrace on this level is complemented by a fireplace and offers a wonderful setting for entertaining and dining. The lowest level functions as a complete ‘guest house’. Carefully positioned terraces and overlooks are sculpted into the bluff and adorned with colorful and flourishing gardens. The opportunities for living and entertaining here are beyond compare, yet it retains a luxurious ambiance and extraordinary privacy. In a word, this home is “perfection”.

Proof that you can have it all. Just above the waves and sandy beach, 1165 Gaviota sits in a perfect location with all the wonder of oceanfront living on one side of the property and the delights of storied Laguna Beach at your doorstep on the other. Newly constructed and stunningly rendered from the plans of renowned C. J. Light Associates and masterfully executed by Robinson Builders, Inc. - Bill Robinson, the residence will be delivered to the new owner furnished by acclaimed designer Michael Fullen. Sophisticated yet casual and welcoming, the vibe is California coastal with a little bit of Laguna twist. The main living level is accessed through a private courtyard beautifully hardscaped with Pennsylvania Bluestone, which features an outdoor kitchen and entertainment venue. The formal entry welcomes one into a great room concept kitchen and living area centered on the panoramic vista of the ocean, Catalina, and coastline views. Retractable Reveal doors form a wall of glass that opens to two generously sized decks above the crashing surf. No expense has been spared in this ultra-luxe appointed residence. The main house offers four (potentially five) bedrooms and four full bathrooms plus powder room as well as laundry with dual washers and dryers. The detached guest suite offers a bedroom, living space, kitchenette, and private laundry. The rooftop deck, extremely rare for an oceanfront Laguna home, offers a second outdoor dining option with dumbwaiter access to the main kitchen level. The entire property features SMART home technology utilizing top-of-the-line Crestron Home Automation System. It is powered by solar energy with battery backup. Configured to function as a primary residence, but with the convenience to 'button up' as a vacation home. Few are able to own on this rarefied oceanfront stretch of the California Riviera.

9 Lagunita is a manifestation of boundless creativity, and privacy, situated on the best beach in all of Laguna.... This property could never be recreated or built today, truly a one-of-a-kind Ocean Front within your own private gated street. Located on Victory beach this property is completely open on all four sides with privacy like no other oceanfront you have seen.... Not only is the property private but you have your own private entry gate to your street that only services your home and one other used as a 2nd vacation property.... You will be unable to find another oceanfront property in Laguna Beach that has more to offer, while also checking all the boxes.... Over 6500+ square feet of decadent interiors that host 6 bedrooms, 6.5 baths, a gym, office, and beach-ready area featuring an outdoor shower and dog wash, direct access to the sand, beach, and ocean.... Enjoys unparalleled views of breaking waves, Catalina Island, and sunsets.... The outdoor living space and a massive backyard with mature trees and landscaping throughout are not believable.... When you're walking this property, you will continue to ask yourself how this can exist here in Laguna... There is no other Ocean front in Orange Country that can compete with all this has to offer.... The photos are great, but this property is all about the feel and experience while being there... Often, the most special of homes are those architects design as their own. Originally built by architect Terry Mechling (associate of renowned residential architect Fred Briggs), this modern masterpiece retains much of its original power and nuance thanks to the careful stewardship of the current architect owner. Most noticeable are the dynamic lines, meticulous and thoughtful placement of large windows framing the vast canyon views, and the quality of the light drawn in throughout the home. The floorplan is functional and well planned – the entry level holds a living room with a massive view window and vaulted ceilings, an elevated oak-floored area for dining or conservatory, a kitchen abundant with glowing woods and modern appliances, and a view deck with a unique flying beam that beautifully frames the sky above. A stunning wood and sculpted-steel curving staircase provides a glorious entry to the middle bedroom level. A wide gallery hall links the bedrooms and exits to an oversized covered terrace – perfect for an outdoor California room. Another graceful, custom-crafted staircase leads to the lowest level – an amazing large bonus space that could serve as office, media room, bedroom, or studio. Throughout the home, the windows bring the outdoors inside and the light is always at play across the day. Updates (such as the newer primary bath) are considered and careful, respectful of the design integrity of the original home. Located in picturesque and peaceful Bluebird Canyon, the home is just minutes from Laguna’s beaches and shops. Ample parking is on-site – a two car garage (complete with a canyon view picture window) enters the home adjacent to the kitchen, while the drive provides space for three to four more vehicles. Special homes are rare – 1369 Bluebird Canyon Drive is just that - a special, architectural gem.
