Embraced by the gated community’s iconic coastal pines, which date back decades to the early history of the virtually hidden bluff-top enclave, the spectacular residence reveals a commanding street presence that is impressive yet welcoming. Once inside, the home’s connection to the outdoors is evident on every level, with gracious patios and decks offering hidden gardens, sunny rooftop paradise, and sprawling main-level terrace accompanied by unobstructed ocean and bay views. Custom glass and wrought-iron entry doors set the scene, and interior spaces measuring approximately 7,119 SF provide an array of settings for grand-scale entertaining and easy, relaxed living. The open-concept main level showcases a grand foyer with a magnificent floating spiral staircase,  great room that opens to the main terrace via glass sliding doors, and fully appointed kitchen with custom wood cabinetry, an island, separate breakfast room with private patio, walk-in pantry, and preferred appliances from Wolf, Fisher & Paykel, Sub-Zero, and Miele. Crowned by a towering cross-loin ceiling, the formal dining room opens to the outdoors via newer Fleetwood French doors. Four ensuite bedrooms and nine baths in a variety of configurations provide comfort for residents and guests, with the primary suite opening to a delightful meditation garden and offering two walk-in closets and a jetted tub. Custom mosaics, wood and stone-tile flooring, globally sourced handcrafted appointments, three fireplaces, newer separate generator, an elevator to all levels, and upgraded AV system are just some of the estate’s countless amenities. On the bedroom level, an inviting wood-paneled study displays a coffered ceiling, custom built-ins, one of the home's four wet bars, temperature-controlled wine cellar, and garden access. Catering to the automotive aficionado, an 11-car garage on the lower level presents boundless opportunities to create the ultimate show garage or entertainment venue. A versatile office is also featured on this level and includes a bath and kitchenette. Ascend to the rooftop deck by stairs or elevator and enjoy a fireplace, newer glass surrounds, newer above-ground spa, built-in BBQ, and dining area surrounded by breathtaking vistas.

Recently rebuilt modern home, perched over PCH across from 1000 Steps Beach.  Unobstructed ocean views from most rooms.   Enjoy beautiful sunsets.  The  main home has 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, A permitted ADU is on ground level,  this has a full bath.  You can use it in a variety of ways..  The house is two blocks to the steps to 1000 Steps Beach.   The main floor has a bedroom/bath with steam shower, a kitchen/living room open floor plan with well sized deck and foldable glass doors to bring the outside inside.  Vaulted ceilings,   Kitchen has quartz counters and large island with bar seating.  Enjoy the views of the ocean as you cook or relax..  The downstairs level includes a Den/Office area as well as full bath with tub/shower combo and a large bedroom with ocean view deck.    The house was rebuilt in 2020.  Only one original area remains, the rest was ground up construction.  The home has ductless HVAC in each room.  House has 2 car parking deck.  Home has two bedrooms, one has in suite bath with steam shower.  The 2nd bedroom has Tub/shower combo.  Parking deck has EV Charger.  Home has tankless Hot water heater,  Solar Cells on Roof  fully paid for, Metal Roof,  Milgard double pain windows .  Owner is Calif RE Broker

Warm and contemporary, this custom Laguna Beach home redefines ocean-view living in Lower Bluebird Canyon. Overlooking a dramatic canyon, this 3-bedroom home is nestled on an inviting cul-de-sac and offers beautiful views of the Pacific Ocean, evening lights and gentle hills from nearly every room in the multi-level design. Finished with vaulted open-beam wood ceilings, wood flooring, smooth white walls, sleek stair railings, and an abundance of view-enriched windows, the home is welcoming to all. Generously sized at approximately 2,333 square feet, the floorplan features additional non-measured spaces, including a temperature-controlled wine cellar storing nearly 2,000 bottles and unfinished storage room with a separate entrance. The primary suite sits off the kitchen and offers sublime, in-bed views, a walk-in closet, and elegant bath beneath a skylight. Further along, a secondary en suite guest bedroom provides a hillside panorama. Idyllic for guests, the lower level features a third bedroom, guest bath with oversized walk-in shower, living room with fireplace, wet bar, sizable laundry room, additional views, and separate entrance. Indoor-outdoor entertaining is easily enjoyed on the main level, which opens to a covered wraparound view deck, and hosts a fireplace-warmed living room, dining space, and kitchen complemented by generous wood cabinetry, quartz countertops, a Viking cooktop and a built-in Liebherr refrigerator. A fabulous location complements the home, placing it close to Bluebird Park, Laguna’s famous beaches, award-winning schools, and village shops and restaurants.

Welcome to “The Estate" – This could be YOUR very own slice of Mediterranean style living, situated on a glorious THREE acres of private grounds and right in the middle of Laguna Beach, California. Designed by world-renowned Architect, Mark Singer, to showcase the panoramic ocean, hills, and canyon views from EVERY ROOM!   Centrally located within Laguna Village, yet perched privately above the busy hustle and bustle of the city in the ultra-quiet Temple Hills, overlooking downtown and world-renowned Main Beach, and only minutes to the sand. Laguna Beach offers ample restaurants with both casual and exquisite fine dining options, wonderful shopping and art galleries, and some of the most breathtaking beaches in all of Southern CA.   Tucked away from the street behind a gated entrance, this home has been masterfully designed and crafted with the highest quality finishes and orientated to capture the breathtaking views towards the canyon & Laguna City lights and Catalina Island on the horizon! The kind of views that are often sought but seldom found.   On offer are 4 bedrooms, all with ensuite bathrooms. An impressively-sized Great Room, complete with gorgeous wood-beamed cathedral ceilings, leads out to the massive viewing deck, easily large enough to entertain a large group. Five view decks/balconies in total!    The lower level is accessed via a wide travertine tiled staircase and included the generous Master suite and retreat, featuring his and hers oversized closets, luxurious main suite bath with jetted jacuzzi tub and separate shower/steam room.    Additional features to this gorgeous home include a handsome library, wine cellar, lower-level family room with space for a pool table, and multiple office spaces. The well-appointed chef's kitchen is complete with double ovens, 6-burner gas stove, sub-zero refrigerator/freezer and beautiful stone counter tops. A laundry room with sink, three bay, direct access garage, with wall-to-wall storage and additional office street carparking for guests   "The Estate" is a one-of-a-kind property that is a “must view”!

Contemporary Beach Cottage with Catalina Views!  This lovely location is in South Laguna on a corner lot.  Enjoy the ocean views as soon as you enter the home!  Multiple windows bring natural light that brighten the entire house.   Master bedroom with french doors that open onto a spacious deck upstairs.  2nd bedroom and 2nd bath located downstairs with an attached oversized fininshed garage that can be used as additional living flex space (not included in the square footage.)  This home features an enclosed backyard & front yard on a drip irrigation system/Timer for easy maintenance.  Private street provides an additional 3 parking spaces and 2 driveway spots.   Walking distance (5min) to iconic Thousand Steps Beach and more.

Ideally located just steps from Victoria Beach, this move-in ready, impressively remodeled 3 bedroom, 3 bath home offers spectacular ocean, whitewater and Catalina Island views. Completely updated by renowned Los Angeles designer James Lumsden, enter through the quintessential dutch door and up to the spacious living and dining areas featuring sweeping views, open-beam ceilings, a fireplace and spacious deck, perfect for outdoor dining and enjoying breathtaking sunsets. The gorgeous updated kitchen features custom designed cabinets, imported tile backsplash, Corian countertops and under-counter wine cooler. The primary bedroom, which opens directly onto a large deck, offers stunning ocean, whitewater and hillside views. The beautiful en-suite bathroom features a custom designed vanity area and tiled walk-in shower. On the lower level you will find two additional bedrooms, one featuring a third private deck with ocean views. Also on the lower level is another fully updated bathroom, plus direct access to the two-car garage and laundry. Conveniently situated on a street-to-street lot, the rear of the home includes ample driveway parking and an outdoor shower. Surrounded by renowned beaches, acclaimed art galleries, restaurants and shopping, 155 McAulay is the perfect opportunity to live or vacation along a stretch of one of the most beautiful coastlines in the world.

Here you will find a charming beach cottage with the look and feel of yesteryear on a large spacious corner lot!  The house is  bright from abundant wood casement windows and wood/glass doors throughout. Once though the welcoming bright colored entry door, the living area is open, anchored by a brick fireplace.  The kitchen and two baths have all been updated. The primary bedroom, located at the rear of the home, has  French doors that open to a newer deck with grass and a stone fountain beyond.  The yard wraps around the house with greenery in every corner.  With its prime location, this beach cottage is just minutes away from fine dining, local shopping, art galleries, and picturesque beaches. You don't want to let this one get away.

Nestled in the ever-popular Laguna Village, this spectacular residence carries an active, short-term lodging permit and offers an impressive and tranquil space. A short drive from a multitude of beaches, restaurants, boutiques, hiking trails, and five-star resorts, the well-designed interiors of approximately 2,404 square feet host four bedrooms and three-and-one-half bathrooms. Enter through double doors and onto a welcoming foyer with steps to the open-plan living area where high ceilings, fireplace, and built-in shelving offer a beautiful setting for relaxing and entertaining. Ascend to the main level where a formal dining area and immaculate kitchen with granite countertops adjoin. Sharing a footprint with the kitchen, the main level primary suite boasts a luxurious bath enclosed by chic barn doors. Extending the entertainment options outside, an expansive deck and private yard provide plenty of room for al fresco dining and large gatherings. Additional highlights include vaulted ceilings, recessed lighting, wood flooring, and French doors. A two-car garage, large driveway, and fully equipped laundry room complete the property.

The View is one of the rarest masterpieces ever seen in Orange County, sure to overwhelm the most refined connoisseur of oceanfront like views! Over the course of 4 years of construction to the highest standards and many more years of development before that, visionaries transformed this unique setting into a world-class compound that can never be duplicated. Seemingly endless stunning oceanfront like views permeate this landmark. The View is a brand new constructed modern home set on an incomparable double-lot spanning over 11,000 sq ft of land with beach access, ocean views that cover the entire 185’ width of the estate, and no neighbors on either side of you, making it feel as though it is in a world unto itself. Transcendent composition spreads the home out across the vast piece of land resulting in exceptional oceanfront like views from every room in the house, and a home with a truly open concept and only 2 stories adding grandeur to the look and feel of the spaces. The very open feel extends into the master suite conveniently placed on the main level. Highly prized rear facing ocean views are the perfect accompaniment for outdoor seating spaces with spectacular ocean views off all areas and bedrooms of the home. Outdoor-living, a quintessential aspect of the California lifestyle, is the inspiration for the approximately 439 sq ft of decks and 570 sq ft of covered outdoor spaces that feature dramatic ocean views, and the state-of-the-art sliding doors that frame the spectacular views at every opening except for 1 bathroom. Sophisticated planning produced magnificent ocean views from all 4 sides of the property surrounding the home. Highly sought after yet scarcely found loggia perfect for year round usage boasts dazzling oceanfront like views, surround sound, 6’ cool-to-the-touch linear fireplace, 75” tv, 60” flush mounted heaters. Phenomenal ocean views begin from the drive to the home, & oceanfront like views welcome you home at the grand glass entry pivot door. The magnitude of the quantity and quality of these picturesque views is unrivaled by oceanfront homes in Laguna Beach. Every detail has been handcrafted using the finest finishes: European style cabinets, marble & limestone slabs, Wolf & Sub Zero appliances, Lutron & Control 4 automation, 3 surround sound locations & many zones, 3 cool-to-the-touch linear fireplaces including 8’ one in great room with 85” tv above it, high ceilings, security system, floating tub, 4 climate zones.

As if out of a story book, this 1932 cottage exudes the kind of charm and warmth typically found only in fairytales. Located in the Historic Art Colony district with streets aptly named after many of Laguna's most famous early artists, this home offers ocean and Catalina Island views from a perch that feels as if you are in a treehouse. The layout offers three lower-level bedrooms, two baths, one on each floor, and an open floor plan. The upper level has vaulted ceilings and vibrant natural light. The refurbished kitchen, with stunning fossilized stone counters, opens to the living and dining spaces making the home feel larger than it is. The living room has a brick fireplace that extends to a cozy, windowed nook looking out onto the surrounding foliage and ocean view beyond. Outside, the passion of this property continues with adorable grounds, a large deck and several areas for outdoor dining and entertaining that can only be fully appreciated in person. Meticulously manicured, the surrounding grounds are as fabulous as the inside. Ideally located in the heart of the City, far enough to avoid the hubbub of tourist parking, but close enough to stroll into town, this home is a unique treasure. Considering all that Laguna Beach has to offer: picturesque beaches (of course), over 20,000 acres of open space, incredible art, amazing schools, world-class dining and so much more, this is a must-see property.

This property on Lomita Way is a perfect opportunity for someone to build their Laguna Beach dream home. It has spectacular ocean views, Catalina Island views, and in the evening, views of the city lights. Laguna Beach sits on one of the world's most famous coastlines offering beautiful white sandy beaches, and breathtaking coves. Lomita Way is just a few minutes away from Victoria Beach which is one of the most popular beaches in Laguna. After a day at the beach you can head into town and dine at so many great restaurants that Laguna has to offer. Let's make your dream a reality with this perfect opportunity to build your Laguna Beach home!

New Price. Amazing 180-degree white water, ocean, and Catalina views from this beach cottage on a large street to street lot in Laguna Beach's coveted Coast Royal neighborhood. Short walk to some of the best beaches in Laguna Beach, to include West Beach, Table Rock, Thousand Steps Beach and direct beach access via a pedestrian tunnel to Aliso Beach. The house features a freshly painted interior with hardwood floors, wood beamed ceilings, front tiled patio, rear wood deck, and a hand laid rock backyard. In addition to easy beach access, the Coast Royal neighborhood is within walking distance to the South Laguna Village for restaurants and shops, hiking trails, and The Ranch for golf, dining, and live music. Assumable VA Loan at 2.25%.    Looking for a larger, newer house? The sale includes city approved plans for a major remodel to increase the total house size to 3,576 sqft over three levels with a total of 3 en-suite bedrooms, all with ocean views, large living room, dining room, and family room all with ocean views, large designer kitchen, a bonus third level 680 sqft family room with plans to convert to an ADU, over 800 sqft of ocean view decks and patios, an oversized 538 sqft subterranean two car garage, and a large ocean view backyard with room for a pool. The plans for the major remodel were approved by the City of Laguna Beach Design Review Board (DRB) in October 2021. Since then, we have completed the structural and civil engineering plans, the mechanical, electrical, plumbing, and fire sprinkler plans, and completed the soil testing. The construction plans are all ready to submit to the City for approval and permitting.

Rebuilt in year 2003. An absolute amazing beach home awaits you in this prime Laguna Beach! This tri-level home is designed for your dream beach home experience with 3 bed, 2.5 bath huge office room 2235 sqft residency featuring immaculately finished modern interior, hardwood floors, open living areas with fireplace. Walk out from the living room with stunning pacific ocean view balcony deck with an abundance of privacy. Each level has its own private balcony surrounded by tress with superb ambiance. Master bedroom has direct access to private gardening areas with inspirational suite bathroom including soaking tub, private standing shower and walk in closets. An ultimate coastal lifestyle can be enjoyed here and It doesn't get any better than this!

Set in a prime cul-de-sac location in the sought-after Top of the World neighborhood, this spacious and well-maintained Laguna Beach home combines a highly functional floor-plan and a sizable lot with a permitted guest house (ADU). The protected city and canyon views along with the neighborhood privacy create an ultimate tranquil escape. The beautifully updated main house has four well appointed bedrooms, three bathrooms, plus an office.  The master bedroom has a private balcony, overlooking stunning views of the Saddleback Valley. The property is located just minutes from Alta Laguna Park, award winning schools, beautiful beaches, scenic hiking trails and world class shopping and dining. Don't miss this chance to own a substantial home in world-renowned Laguna Beach!

This iconic Laguna Beach landmark property on 3 continuous lots includes over 72 feet of private roped off beach frontage. There are currently 3 structures on the property including an irreplaceable home that sits directly on the sand. Enjoy the private funicular/outdoor elevator which takes you from the upper home directly down to the beach. The private Shangri-La beach area includes a thatch roof palapa, meandering garden path, private ocean front deck and fenced off beach area where you will feel like you are at your own tropical island resort. Situated on famed Thousand Steps Beach, this property offers the ability to enjoy the current homes, remodel the present structures or redevelop altogether.  All three current structures are situated on one lot with the two adjacent two lots (included) being undeveloped. There is ample parking including a 4-car garage and an additional 4 private parking spaces. The lots offered total over 17,000 square feet. Nowhere else in coastal Orange County can you take advantage of your own private roped off beach area where you can enjoy BBQ’s, bon fires, pets and your favorite libations…truly one of a kind.

Surrounded by privacy hedges, little of this special North Laguna property is evident from the street. Once behind the gates, the elevated sense of style emerges – from the front courtyard to the dual residences and abundant outdoor space, this is a nuanced, comfortable retreat. The front residence showcases the sophisticated design. With two bedrooms and two baths, this is a home to enjoy privately or with friends. The sleek kitchen serves as the centerpiece, but the living spaces on each end of the home provide the bling. With a sweep of mid-century windows to the front and an open wall of glass to the rear, the outdoors play as large a part of the design as the inner spaces. An amazing tiered courtyard between the two homes provides an entertaining focal point that can host intimate gatherings or large soirees. The property is built to truly live indoor/outdoor. Behind the courtyard sits a second two bedroom home, providing a myriad of living options. 170 High Drive is unlike any home available in Laguna Beach. Clever design, updated by the current owners, delights at every turn. The flexible two home layout is a study in California Cool. All this, while just a short jaunt from the beaches, art galleries, restaurants and desirable lifestyle that make Laguna Beach so enviable.

NORTH END BEACH SIDE EMERALD BAY - An ideal Emerald Bay residence located at the Emerald Bay "North End" on the ocean side of Pacific Coast Highway. 4 bedrooms with 3 bathrooms on an approximately 7,560 square foot flat lot with an oversized rear yard that offers ideal and private indoor and outdoor living plus an enclosed front entry courtyard. Designed with a main floor primary bedroom, two additional main floor bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living/dining room that opens up to the large rear and flat grassy yard. Upstairs is the fourth bedroom and bathroom plus a bonus room with a balcony with ocean and water views. Located within walking distance to Emerald Bay`s north-end beach and easy access in and out of Emerald Bay through the private beachside resident Gate 7.

Nearing completion and nestled on the hillside overlooking forever views of twinkling city lights and the deep blue sea, this enchanting architectural marvel designed by John O’Neill is a study in elegance and charm. Completely redesigned and reinvented by the current stewards of the home and designer Lisa McDennon, the beauty of this modern farmhouse is a perfect marriage of Italian style, Spanish flair and present-day finishes. The quality of the home is reflected in its superior craftsmanship, attention to detail and the finest materials. The thoughtful floor plan allows optimal livability with now 4 bedrooms, 4.5 baths, and a separate office and bonus room. An additional 1,000 square feet have been added to make it the perfect escape or retreat from the real world. The luxurious primary suite, living room and kitchen offer direct access to ocean-view terraces and delightful patios, further complementing comfort and effortless entertaining with a seamless fusion of indoor and outdoor living. Appointed with professional-grade appliances, every aspect of the kitchen was considered with the layout, as it now opens to the living room. Beyond the home’s walls awaits the equally magical grounds, complete with pathways leading past romantic rose gardens, fountains and lawns. An upper-level terrace spanning the width of the home showcases a spa and a circular dining tower that affords fresh sea breezes year-round. This exceptional residence captures the true essence of the California Riviera lifestyle and is perfect for lavish entertaining, as a relaxing sanctuary, or for cherished family time together while enjoying the peaceful, ocean views. LOVE WHERE YOU LIVE!

Rising impressively above Summit Drive, the residence at 794 Summit is a surprisingly spacious and sophisticated home. Once inside, the sense of neighbors and the street below melts away and the gorgeous ocean views command your attention. The main level, accessible by elevator from the street level, is a study in gracious open living with pocketing doors allowing seamless indoor/outdoor living and access to a generously sized ocean view terrace. The upper level of the home hosts a sumptuous primary suite with an abundant private view deck, and a large fully finished home office with dual desks. Straddling a street-to-street parcel, the property comes with a rare commodity for view living in Laguna Beach – abundant parking with a two car garage and room for two additional vehicles below, and off-street private parking for up to four more vehicles above. The finish level and bespoke detail work is superb, creating a special environment that feels like no other home. The main-level kitchen, with media and breakfast rooms adjacent, plays exotic woods against high-end hard surfaces to create a stunning and functional heart of the home. Secondary bedrooms are on the entry level, nicely separated from the primary suite. The soaring staircase creates a wonderful focal point in the center of the residence – capped by a custom round skylight that fills the center of the home with sunshine. During the day, the home is awash in light. At night, the custom lighting adds nuance and drama to the home while the city lights come alive below. A custom stainless steel art fountain welcomes you to the home, and an additional unique water feature provides a focal point for one of the many outdoor spaces. This is not the ordinary – 794 Summit Drive is an extraordinary ocean view retreat that delights at every turn.

WHAT A GREAT OPPORTUNITY TO MOVE TO LAGUNA AND HAVE SUCH A SPECIAL HOME, COMPLETELY REMODELED! Canyon Acre's is a community where you'll never want to leave! Rare opportunity to own an amazing property in Laguna Canyon. The perfect blank canvas for Artists and Gardeners who are looking for privacy and tranquility. As your guest drive up to the property, they will be greeted with an array of fruit trees and beautiful greenery as you walk up the steps to the entrance. Once you enter the home, you’ll love the light bright open floor-plan, with beautiful windows and unobstructed views. Natural flooring and crisp white walls will show off your artwork beautifully. The updated Kitchen with new Shaker Cabinets, Quartz Counters, Coffee Bar and Stainless Steel Appliances is open to the dining and living area with two sets of French Doors that open to an expansive deck,  the ultimate indoor/outdoor living. Down the hall are two spacious bedrooms with their own entrance’s and another large side yard. Your guest are going to fall in love with this super cute full bath.   Wait till you see the amazing windows and canyon views, when you walk upstairs, with the perfect spot for a telescope to count the stars or a serene work area.  Upstairs, you’ll find the master retreat with en-suite bath and a very large walk-in closet. French doors in the master that lead you to the third private roof top patio. This home sits above a 4 car garage with an incorporated Art Studio plus a large driveway that could hold an RV.  Simply breathtaking nature surrounds the the home, walking distance to all the festivals and only 5 minutes away from downtown Laguna Beach, with exceptional dining, shopping, art and amazing views.

A contemporary Mark Singer masterpiece overlooking the Pacific Coast in Laguna Beach. Completed in 2019, this North Laguna location on Dunnegan Drive was chosen for its unsurpassed sweeping ocean and magnificent coastal views. No detail was overlooked in this elegant jewel. A signature Singer design with exposed concrete, raw metals, expansive movable glass walls, 10-foot high doors, and soaring White Oak ceilings. Museum walls finished in Venetian plaster, sensuous Daniel Ogassian concrete tile, Porcelanosa porcelain slab and tile, and Quartz countertops are just a taste of the exquisite finishes. Open up to indoor/outdoor living with over 1,700 square feet of expansive deck space. Create in a kitchen designed for a Cordon Bleu Chef leaving nothing to spare. California coastal living, timeless style, and the finest amenities.

This contemporary private retreat, nestled in the serene area of Temple Hills, boasts unobstructed views of ocean and canyon. Natural lighting and ocean breeze flows throughout the home with its open floor plan and vaulted ceilings. The main level includes a formal living room with fireplace, formal dining room, sitting area, full kitchen, and luxurious owner suite with fireplace and access to a full-size deck. Down a short flight of stairs, the second level features a family room, two en-suite bedrooms, full-size sauna, exercise room, laundry room, an additional deck, and tons of storage space. The lowest level highlights a mother-in-law suite with an open kitchen and living space. The private backyard is ideal for entertainment and relaxation, with a poolside cabana, renovated salt water pool, and spa, all overlooking the breathtaking views. An oversized three-car garage and circular driveway with plenty of space for multiple additional cars complete this one-of-a-kind home, perfect for those who are looking for a modern hideaway in the hills of Laguna Beach.

What a great location to have a Laguna Beach cottage! It is just a half mile flat walk to the Pageant of the Masters, one mile to jump in the ocean at Main Beach or stroll downtown visiting renowned art galleries and restaurants. The cottage is situated on a quiet, tree lined cul-de-sac. This home offers a unique balance of walkability and privacy not often found in Laguna Beach. There is lots of potential for expansion on the highly desirable 10,000 sq ft flat lot. In 2014 the city reviewed architectural drawings expanding the home to 1800+ sq ft with an addition of a garage. The review panel voted to continue the favorable design. The home also has a separate metal and wood workshop which is about 400 sq ft.  The private backyard is an artists's retreat escape.  Don"t miss this great opportunity to own a piece of Laguna charm.

Perched atop Scenic Dr. in South Laguna Beach, The Historical “Bridge Home," designed by well known architect J. Lamont Langworthy. This 3 bedroom, two bath, nearly 2,000 square foot residence features expansive wood beamed vaulted ceilings, whitewashed wood walls, with floor-to-ceiling windows that open to a dramatic tree line view. Walls of glass reveal the top-end finishes and features characterizing the woodsy elements with a beachy vibe. Lives like a Single Level, situated on a 7,500 sq. ft. lot and a private seventy-five’ bridge driveway. Enter through the intricately detailed custom Dutch door to your fully remodeled gourmet kitchen featuring Vienna Thermofoil cabinets with soft close drawers and pull outs, quartz counters, tiled backsplash, Viking refrigerator, Schott Ceran electric cooktop and a farmhouse sink. Your expansive dining area offers a dramatic brick fireplace for those romantic dinners and French doors leading to your backyard fully landscaped and lined in cortex decking. Exceptional master suite features ocean views, dual closets, private balcony, and bamboo shades. Master bath boasts a walk-in tiled shower and glass block. Entire home is elegantly lined in Luxury Vinyl flooring. This one-of-a-kind home offers epic sunsets and ocean views from the master suite and living space in this vast, open-concept estate and complete privacy. The wide lot takes full advantage of the tranquil yard offering lush trees, bamboo, mature fruit trees and a river rock creek running through it. Additional upgrades include: AC approx. 2016, upgraded electrical panel 2018, upgraded plumbing 2018, French doors with retractable screens 2018, sprinkler system on timers, exterior lighting and security motion sensors, rain gutters 2021, updated roof work, barn doors, bridge under wood and railings replaced 2018, and new washer & dryer. Walking distance from Laguna's best swimmable beaches, Trolley stops, & Dining. Clean Lines, Sophisticated, Rustic meets coastal living in this exquisite South Laguna one-of-a-kind home. A perfect getaway year-round living. Close to Montage, Ritz, Dana Point Harbor & John Wayne Airport. The ultimate in South Laguna Beach living!

Major Price Reduction. Welcome to this stunning new (only lived in one week since completion) contemporary Laguna Village home, featuring crisp, clean, linear architecture and blue-water views. Follow the flow of fresh sea air as it wafts from the ocean, across the cantilevered front deck, through the open-concept spacious living, dining, kitchen and library areas, beneath six skylights to the two bedrooms and baths. In the backyard, a roomy deck awaits your lounging and outdoor furniture. On the street level, the garage has an EV charging outlet and extra room for your beach golf cart. Plus, there is a large lighted storage room. Cement slabs and steps surround the home, providing easy access and stability. There is an extensive drainage system for ground water and lighted landscaping for drama. Best of all, you are walking distance from Main Beach, shops, restaurants, art galleries and all the fun that Laguna Beach has to offer.

Welcome to your Three Arch Bay “period modern” home where plush beach bungalow meets smart farmhouse function. No detail was missed in this remodeled ocean-view charmer, including the 2-car garage with rustic carriage house doors. Throughout this spacious cottage, you will delight in high-end on-point finishes, natural wood & stone materials, ample pocket & chandelier lighting, custom built-ins, multiple outdoor entertainment venues, and intelligent use of space. Relax in your indoor-outdoor living room under vaulted beamed ceilings, floor to ceiling windows, and ocean breezes or on the adjacent dining deck. Delight in your chic French country kitchen with on-trend classic checkerboard flooring, Calacatta marble countertops, premium appliances, and ample cupboard space. Each bathroom carries through this refined style with natural stone components, custom cabinetry, and metal finishes. Meander outside where white rose bushes in year-round bloom line English pebble walk paths. Nestled in the most sought-after South Laguna private beachside community with gated entry, court-sport amenities, clubhouse, and ample community events.

Boasting unparalleled ocean views throughout, this modern masterpiece is easily one of the best view properties in all of Laguna Beach. Sited on a street-to-street lot at the end of a cul de sac with a spacious and private setting, this hillside estate enjoys seemingly endless views of the ocean and city lights unfolding below, while surrounding you with gorgeous design and architecture. A comprehensive remodel completed in 2015 affords the home with a unique blend of sophistication and style, with features such as extensive windows & sliding doors, beautiful glass fireplaces, high ceilings, a spiral staircase, and an elevator. Perfect for entertaining, the main living area extends onto a massive ocean view terrace with beautiful vintage tiling inside and out. The open concept kitchen impresses with elegant countertops and cabinetry, stainless steel appliances by Miele, large center island with sink and seating, and oversized pantry with space for large appliances. A full bath, laundry room and two bedrooms each with ensuite bathrooms complete the primary level, while the owner’s suite upstairs showcases truly breathtaking ocean views, a balcony, and spa-like bathroom with dual walk-in showers, separate tub and fireplace.
